query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT s.symbol) as total_stocks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twStockPrices) as total_price_records,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT symbol) FROM twStockPrices) as stocks_with_prices,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twDataSyncStatus) as sync_status_records,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM twDataSyncErrors WHERE resolved = false) as unresolved_errors,
  (SELECT MAX(updatedAt) FROM twStocks) as latest_sync_time,
  (SELECT MIN(date) FROM twStockPrices) as earliest_price_date,
  (SELECT MAX(date) FROM twStockPrices) as latest_price_date
FROM twStocks s
